sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core' import { FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { FormlyFieldConfig } from '@ngx-formly/core'; import { UserModel } from 'src/app/models/user-model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } form = new FormGroup({}); model ={} as UserModel; fields: FormlyFieldConfig[] = [ { key: 'name', type: 'input', templateOptions: { label: 'Nume utilizator', placeholder: 'Introduceti numele utilizator: ', required: true, } }, { key: 'email', type: 'input', templateOptions: { label: 'Adresa de email', placeholder: 'Introduceti adresa de email: ', required: true, } }, { key: 'password', type: 'input', templateOptions: { label: 'Va rugam alegeti o parola', placeholder: 'Introduceti parola: ', required: true, } } ]; onSubmit() { this.model.role=2; if ((this.model.name!=null)&&(this.model.password!=null)&&(this.model.email!=null)) console.log(this.model); else console.log("Eroare"); } }
restaurant Inregistrare Va rugam sa completati formularul de inregistrare

Make your screen larger to see a horizontal stepper
